titleStmt.title: The original [and] sprynge of all sectes [and] orders by whome, wha or were they beganne. Translated out of hye Dutch in Englysh.
titleStmt.author: Coverdale, Miles, 1488-1568, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: By me James Nicolson for Jhon Gough],

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon.
Running title reads: Of sectes and orders.
Variant: 1 British Library copy has folio 23 misnumbered "2".
Identified as STC 18849a on UMI microfilm reel 681.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the British Library.
Appears at reel 681 ø (Folger Shakespeare Library copy, identified as STC 18849a), at reel 122 #2, and at reel 1666 ⁵ (both British Library copy).
